SELECT emp_code, name, a.assign_code, assign_name, dep_name, join_date, IFNULL(resign_date, "") resign_date, account FROM employee e JOIN `assignment` a ON e.assign_code = a.assign_code JOIN department d ON e.dep_code = d.dep_code
WHERE join_date < DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01')
AND (resign_date >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m-01') OR resign_date IS NULL)
AND a.assign_code = #{assign_code}

SELECT IF(e.resign_date IS NULL OR e.resign_date >= DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01') , IF(e.join_date > DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m-01') , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM attendance a JOIN att_code ac ON a.atten_code = ac.atten_code JOIN employee e ON a.emp_code = e.emp_code WHERE a.emp_code = #{emp_code} AND (a.atten_code = 1 OR a.atten_code = 3) AND work_date BETWEEN join_date AND DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m-31') ) * 8 * a.hourly , a.monthly ) , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM attendance a JOIN att_code ac ON a.atten_code = ac.atten_code JOIN employee e ON a.emp_code = e.emp_code WHERE a.emp_code = #{emp_code} AND (a.atten_code = 1 OR a.atten_code = 3) AND work_date BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m-01') AND resign_date ) * 8 * a.hourly ) month FROM `assignment` a JOIN employee e ON a.assign_code = e.assign_code WHERE a.assign_code = #{assign_code} AND e.emp_code = #{emp_code}

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(work_over), 0) workOver FROM attendance a JOIN att_code ac ON a.atten_code = ac.atten_code JOIN employee e ON a.emp_code = e.emp_code WHERE a.emp_code = #{emp_code} AND a.atten_code = 1 AND YEAR(work_date) = YEAR(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) AND MONTH(work_date) = MONTH(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH))

SELECT COUNT(*) absence FROM attendance a JOIN att_code ac ON a.atten_code = ac.atten_code JOIN employee e ON a.emp_code = e.emp_code WHERE e.emp_code = #{emp_code} AND ac.atten_code = 2 AND YEAR(work_date) = YEAR(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) AND MONTH(work_date) = MONTH(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH))

SELECT IF(DATE_FORMAT(drop_date, '%Y-%m-01') = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m-01'), remain_cnt, 0) etc FROM dayoff_count dc JOIN employee e ON dc.emp_code = e.emp_code WHERE e.emp_code = #{emp_code}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pay p WHERE emp_code = #{emp_code} AND pay_year = YEAR(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) AND pay_month = MONTH(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH))

SELECT a.emp_code as empCode, a.name as name, d.assign_name as assignName, e.dep_name as depName, b.pay_year as payYear, b.pay_month as payMonth, b.actual_pay as actualPay, b.etc as etc, b.upd_name as updName FROM employee a JOIN pay b ON a.emp_code = b.emp_code JOIN assignment d ON a.assign_code = d.assign_code JOIN department e ON a.dep_code = e.dep_code
AND (a.emp_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SEARCH_WORD}, '%') OR a.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SEARCH_WORD}, '%') OR d.assign_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SEARCH_WORD}, '%') OR e.dep_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SEARCH_WORD}, '%'))
AND a.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SEARCH_WORD}, '%')
AND e.dep_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SEARCH_WORD}, '%')
AND (b.pay_year BETWEEN #{START_YEAR} AND #{END_YEAR})
AND (b.pay_month BETWEEN #{START_MONTH} AND #{END_MONTH})
ORDER BY b.pay_month DESC ,a.emp_code ASC
